price: So Allah protected him from the evil that they plotted, and the people of Pharaoh were overwhelmed by an evil punishment:
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُواْۖ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
